plot: The career of Alexander Hamilton from 1780 through 1793 is chronicled, including his constribution to the early nation as both a soldier and a statesman.
title: Alexander Hamilton
plot_es: The career of Alexander Hamilton from 1780 through 1793 is chronicled, including his constribution to the early nation as both a soldier and a statesman.
